data.text: Won xa bɛɛti ba Marigi bɛ sɛɛwɛ ra,
barima Alatala, Ala xungbe na a ra,
alɔ baa nun bɔxi a naxee daaxi a bɛlɛxɛ ra.
Wo fa, won xa suyidi, won xa won igoro,
barima a tan nan won Marigi Ala ra.
Wo naxa wo bɔɲɛe raxɔrɔxɔ alɔ naxan nabaxi Meriba,
Wo benbae n mato nɛ na lɔxɔɛ,
Na bɔnsɔɛ xa fe naxa raɲaaxu n ma ɲɛ tongo naani bun ma.
Na kui n naxa n kali n ma xɔnɛ kui,
